section.title: Running MyFaces apps inside Tomcat 4.x
section.p: MyFaces has a dependency on some of the classes in the JSP2.0 spec. As a result applications based on MyFaces will not run without the inclusion of the jsp-2.0.jar file in the WEB-INF/lib directory of your .war file.
We hope this helps, if not please contact the user list at MyFaces.
